snippet: A report in the Travel Advisory column on March 15, about a Gold Rush exhibition at the Oakland Museum of California, misstated the special admission fees for the event. They are $8 for adults, $6 for students and those 65 and over....
lead_paragraph: A report in the Travel Advisory column on March 15, about a Gold Rush exhibition at the Oakland Museum of California, misstated the special admission fees for the event. They are $8 for adults, $6 for students and those 65 and over.
abstract: Correction of March 15 article about Gold Rush exhibition at Oakland Museum of California (S)4
